foot_msg.txt: A simple Tic Tac Toe game demo built with React.js and Node.js.

home.txt:
This is a simple X Tic Tac Toe multiplayer demo game. It's built with React.js and Node.js.
view source at github.com/WL0416/TicTacToe

For demonstration purposes.

info.txt:
This is a simple example of React.js and Node.js stack based web app


Front End - major libraries used:

  • react
  • webpack
  • babel
  • react-router-dom
  • reactjs-popup
  • sass
  • jest
  • axios
  • gsap

Server - major libraries used:

  • node.js
  • express
  • express-ws
  • nodemailer

Configurable with external XML file - ws_conf.xml



For demonstration purposes.
